No I am sorry, I don't have this code anymore, because I have never been able 
to reproduce this bug with the same code (I tried several times).

Taking a look at the code, the only obvious way I can see for fNewWorkingCopies 
to be null is if a CoreException was thrown during the call to 
RenameAnalyzeUtil.getNewWorkingCopies in getNewOccurrences(...).
We might want to close as WORKSFORME and reopen it if this problem occurs again.
